snippet: The electronics company predicted a profit of $7.1 billion for the last quarter, which would be a 24 percent decline over the same period a year ago, and cited slower sales and increased competition in China.
abstract: Samsung Electronics predicts profit of $7.1 billion for most recent quarter, which would be a 24 percent decline over the same period a year ago; blames disappointing forecast on slower sales and increased competition in China.
lead_paragraph: The electronics company predicted a profit of $7.1 billion for the last quarter, which would be a 24 percent decline over the same period a year ago, and cited slower sales and increased competition in China.

headline.main: Samsung Foresees a Decline in Profit
headline.print_headline: Samsung Foresees a Decline in Profit
